dmca.title: Olsens track down Twin Tracker website
dmca.body:
We are counsel for Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen and their company, Dual Star Entertainment Group, LLC ("Dualstar"). We write to you in reference to the unauthorized "Twin Tracker" website and photographs being displayed on the internet by your website located at www.twintracker.com.

I. The use of Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen's names and likenesses in close association with your website conveys to viewers that Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen have authorized or sponsored this website and/or its content, or authorized the use of their names and likenesses by your website. This deceptive practice is violation of the Lanham Act, 15 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen and Dualstar Entertainment Group, LLC
